channel.title: The Gilded Age on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Touting 142 Emmy Noms, Casey Bloys Talks ‘Penguin’ and ‘White Lotus’ Futures, ‘Duster’ Demise, HBO Max Re-Re-Brand
item.description: The top creative exec at HBO and HBO Max says he’s more concerned about Mike White’s safety on ‘Survivor’ than he is over the return date of his juggernaut drama; confirms Chip and Joanna Gaines’ Magn

item.title: ‘The Gilded Age’ Star Taissa Farmiga Unpacks That Life-Altering Decision
item.description: Farmiga, who plays Gladys, answers burning questions about her beloved character’s state of mind throughout her current harrowing ordeal.

item.title: ‘The Gilded Age’ Star Taissa Farmiga Unpacks That Life-Altering Decision

item.title: Ben Ahlers on Being a ‘Gilded Age’ Tech Bro and His Fashion World Cred (He’s 6-Foot-2!)
item.description: The breakout butler of HBO’s historical hit says “there’s something so inherently theatrical” about playing with style.
